EmailTemplate.description: Auto-email sent to YP when enough hours for CwD have been logged, but verification has not been done.
EmailTemplate.name: Notification of unverified CwD achieved
EmailTemplate.subject: You have logged enough hours for the Challenge with Distinction award!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Congratulations! You have logged enough hours to be eligible for the prestigious Challenge with Distinction! We are really impressed with the excellent work you have accomplished and the dedication you have shown along the way.
To be able to confirm you have achieved this award we just need to double check your hours and we will be in touch shortly to let you know the next step.
Looking forward to speaking to you soon
Best wishes,
The Challenge Society Team!
